CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 8 reads: "P-TA Target - The Parent-Teachers Association of Herron Hill Junior High School has protested to City Council for the improvement of the upper end of Lyons [Lyon] St. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Two young men, one wearing light colored jacket, walking down Lyon Street with cracked pavement, houses, and one-way street in foreground, Hill District
